column5: Hi all,  Playing around with my new pooter and decided to make a little stop motion for my Star Wars fanatic 4 year old.   After around 20 consecutive giggle laden views later Jack says to me,  "Dad.......how are R2-D2 and Yoda moving by themselves?"  I replied, "ahaaaah....it's magic",  Jack starts laughing and shoots me his 'dad you're so silly/ stop teasing look' and replies,  "it's not magic, you're using an invisible hand!"  AWESOME!
Cool video Simon!!!  Your getting good at it from the new pooter
